title: Overlord Lord of Nazarick Tier List
description: Discover the ultimate Overlord: Lord of Nazarick tier list, ranking the best characters from S Tier to C Tier. Find out which characters dominate Nazarick and play a key role in this dark fantasy series.
heading: Overlord Lord of Nazarick Tier List
introText: Discover the ultimate Overlord: Lord of Nazarick tier list, ranking the best characters from S Tier to C Tier. Find out which characters dominate Nazarick and play a key role in this dark fantasy series.

data.itemDescription: Essential due to the absence of Platinum Dragon Lord’s Armor; excels in team protection and damage mitigation
Top-tier mage with exceptional single-target and AoE power, viable in all game modes
Best healer, ensuring team survival in early and mid-game

Strong PvP unit with shields, counterattacks, and attack reduction.
Platinum Dragon Lord’s Armor: Strongest knight; prevents team deaths as long as his shield remains intact
Highest AoE damage mage, capable of wiping enemy teams instantly
Best dispeller; cleanses, heals, and provides defensive buffs
Weaker than her SS version but still a solid self-sustaining unit
Strong single-target unit with stat buffs and critical damage boosts
Core adventurer team unit; excels in chaining eliminations
Bleeding team’s tank and damage dealer with counterattacks

High burst damage mage but lacks defense.
Pandora’s Actor: Boosts team stats, increasing damage and healing efficiency
Balanced unit with counterattacks but lacks standout abilities
Burn-based mage with stuns but slow power ramp-up
Strong single-target damage but heavily dependent on team synergy
